description: Returns information about the configuration settings for your Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) endpoint.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC endpoint configuration you want to describe.

nested_items.name: vpceConfiguration
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about your VPC endpoint configuration.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC endpoint configuration.

nested_items.name: vpceConfigurationName
nested_items.description: The friendly name you give to your VPC endpoint configuration to manage your configurations more easily.

nested_items.name: vpceServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC endpoint service running in your AWS account that you want Device Farm to test.

nested_items.name: serviceDnsName
nested_items.description: The DNS name that maps to the private IP address of the service you want to access.

nested_items.name: vpceConfigurationDescription
nested_items.description: An optional description that provides details about your VPC endpoint configuration.
